name: planurday
overview:
What is PlanUrDay? Have you ever woken up from a night-mare in which you were worried how to plan your day? You might want to go to an ATM to withdraw some cash, a Mall for shopping, meet a friend at lunch, watch a movie with him in afternoon, do some groceries while coming back home, and fill-up your empty gas tank at the cheapest gas price around. You may have plans for the day, but may not have any clue how to plan it in the most efficient way to minimize your drive. PlanUrDay comes right there to help you plan your day.

How PlanUrDay works? PlanUrDay is easy, fast, and free. Nothing is better than free! All you have to do is getting registered with PlanUrDay. And DONE! PlanUrDay will allow you to add Google (c) powered Places for a variety of places such as ATMs, Shopping, Movie, etc. and PlanUrDay engine will display all relevant search results as pointers on your map. All you will need to do is click the pointer and add it to your route. You can search for your destination using Search Bar and add them as well. PlanUrDay also allows you to add any known destination using auto-fill destination bars and via-points.

PlanUrThings Once you search for a place like ATM or Bank of America, PlanUrDay will display all possible search results in your area. PlanUrDay will recommend you where to go; based upon your setting to optimize the route as per distance or time. As you add more Place, Via-Points, or Destination, PlanUrDay will find the best optimized route for you and highlight the most effective place for you for your selection. If you are bound to go somewhere other than PlanUrDay recommendation, you can ignore the highlighted pointer and select another pointer. PlanUrDay will welcome and add your selection to optimize and return the best route.

PlanUrDeals Not only that, PlanUrDay will bring the best deals from Groupon.com, LivingSocial.com, and many more for you to add to your route. All you have to do is click the deal you want and add it to the route. If you want to buy the deal, just click “visit website” and PlanUrDay will take you there. PlanUrDay won’t even charge you for anything. No need to worry about logging into different online deal websites every day or deleting several emails from your inbox.

Plan4UrFriend PlanUrDay allows planning your day for not only you, but also for your family and friends. All you have to do is ask them what do they want to do today? Just simply go to www.planurday.com and create a route and email them by clicking Send button or Share with Facebook. If you or your family is away from your home or in a new town, PlanUrDay still finds you and allow you to plan the route with your current location.

PlanUrGPS Remember old days, when you used to print the directions and keep it on your driving wheel to find the location. That’s history! You may think that GPS device is just enough for you. Well, that’s My_Space of navigation. Come to the Facebook of day planning. PlanUrDay allows you to send your optimized route to your GPS device. This does not require any entering of destination addresses again and again while you are in your travel. Just plan your day for 5 minutes and send it to your GPS device automatically using PlanUrGPS.

PlanUrMobile PlanUrDay is available on your smart-phones as well. Just go to iPhone or Android App store and download PlanUrDay app for planning your day on your smart-phone while you are away from your computer.

So what are you waiting for? Start planning your days with PlanUrDay.
